verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Arpinthu stutul nee siluvalona Joopina nee premakai Marana mondi samaadhi nundi Marala lechitivi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thalanu mundla kireetamu bondi Kaalla chetulu grutchabadi Baliyaitivi gorre pilla vale Naa korake oh prabhuvaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee chintha valana naaku shaanthi Kalge nee siluva valana kireetam Nee maraname naa jeeva maaye Nee prema goppa dentho{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nenu joochedi mahima swargamu Naa valana kalugadu Aananda bhashmamula thone Stutinthu ee dhanamu naa korake{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee siluvalo tholage naa neecha Paapamu ne dweshinthu nanniyun Nee simhaasanamu naalona Yunchumu ninnu ne stutintunu{/lang-eng}
